entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is introduced as the captain of the Gryffindor Quidditch team. He is described as a tall and burly sixth-year with gleaming eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who is being woken up by Oliver Wood for Quidditch practice.

relationships.description: Oliver Wood wakes Harry up for Quidditch practice.
Harry is involved in the Quidditch practice, as he is being woken up by Oliver Wood to participate.
